message: Fresh air caresses my cheeks.
The roof is just a flat, empty surface beneath a blanket of stars.
What are we doing up here?
As I watch Mink's hair blow in the breeze, I notice something dark sitting next to the water tank.
It's large and covered with a black cloth.
Mink grabs the cloth and tears it off.
Underneath is a motorcycle.
I'm not quite sure how to describe it. I guess you could say it has a "brutal" look. It fits Mink perfectly.
Mink straddles the seat, pulls a key from his pocket, and puts it in the ignition.
The engine rumbles and the dashboard lights up.

name: ミンク
message: "Get on."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"

name: ミンク
message: "Hurry up."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Isn't that a single seater?"

name: ミンク
message: "Just get on."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Where do you expect me to sit?!"

name: ミンク
message: "Wherever you fit."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Wherever I...?!"
Don't make it sound so easy!
But Mink looks ready to drive off without me. I quickly squeeze myself behind him.
It's a tight fit. I'll have to hold onto Mink if I don't want to be thrown―

name: 蒼葉
message: "Whoa!!!"
I throw my arms around him as he takes off without warning.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Wai―!"
I expected as much, but he really floored it! I thought I was gonna fall off!
Mink does a few loops around the roof, building speed.
What is he doing?
Just as my curiosity peaks...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"
Mink abruptly turns the bike and makes a beeline across the roof.

name: ミンク
message: "Try not to piss yourself."
The air rushing past nearly knocks me off, and the bike is vibrating so hard I'm afraid I might bite my tongue.
The bike charges toward the fenceless edge of the roof and keeps going, without stopping―
Weightlessness.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Woah...!"

For a second, it feels like time has stopped.

No way...

There's no fucking way this is happening!
I hear the crash of glass and feel the impact rock my body.
Are we safe? I open my tightly shut eyes.
